body_html: Thanks for the feature request! We're also experimenting with support for defining "functions" in the graph that would basically allow re-usable components to achieve the same effect.
body_text: Thanks for the feature request!  We're also experimenting with support for defining "functions" in the graph that would basically allow re-usable components to achieve the same effect.
body: Thanks for the feature request!  We're also experimenting with support for defining "functions" in the graph that would basically allow re-usable components to achieve the same effect.
